an4.174:1.1: Atha kho ayasma anando yenayasma mahakotthiko tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmata mahakotthikena saddhim sammodi.
an4.174:1.2: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma anando ayasmantam mahakotthikam etadavoca:
an4.174:6.1: “Channam, avuso, phassayatananam asesaviraganirodha atthi ca natthi ca annam kinci”ti?
an4.174:8.1: “Channam, avuso, phassayatananam asesaviraganirodha nevatthi no natthannam kinci”ti?
an4.174:10.1: “‘Channam, avuso, phassayatananam asesaviraganirodha atthannam kinci’ti, iti puttho samano:
an4.174:10.3: ‘Channam, avuso, phassayatananam asesaviraganirodha natthannam kinci’ti, iti puttho samano:
an4.174:10.5: ‘Channam, avuso, phassayatananam asesaviraganirodha atthi ca natthi ca annam kinci’ti, iti puttho samano:
an4.174:10.7: ‘Channam, avuso, phassayatananam asesaviraganirodha nevatthi no natthannam kinci’ti, iti puttho samano:
an4.174:10.9: Yatha katham panavuso, imassa bhasitassa attho datthabbo”ti?
an4.174:11.1: “‘Channam, avuso, phassayatananam asesaviraganirodha atthannam kinci’ti, iti vadam appapancam papanceti.
an4.174:11.2: ‘Channam, avuso, phassayatananam asesaviraganirodha natthannam kinci’ti, iti vadam appapancam papanceti.
an4.174:11.3: ‘Channam, avuso, phassayatananam asesaviraganirodha atthi ca natthi ca annam kinci’ti, iti vadam appapancam papanceti.
an4.174:11.4: ‘Channam, avuso, phassayatananam asesaviraganirodha nevatthi no natthannam kinci’ti, iti vadam appapancam papanceti.
an4.174:11.5: Yavata, avuso, channam phassayatananam gati tavata papancassa gati.
an4.174:11.6: Yavata papancassa gati tavata channam phassayatananam gati.
an4.174:11.7: Channam, avuso, phassayatananam asesaviraganirodha papancanirodho papancavupasamo”ti.
